explanation: [0-0] Against a gray background, sits a green Creeper wearing a yellow scarf. Its eyes are half-closed, looking to the left.

[0-7] First, the green Creeper turns its head, opens its mouth wide, glances to the right with wide eyes, then frowns. It opens its mouth to reveal two rows of white teeth, and some red symbols appear on its head. On the right side, a hand appears and extends an index finger towards the Creeper. The Creeper closes its eyes and mouth, and the scene switches to show the back of a person wearing black pants and a purple top. This person twists their body, raises their hands, and puts on a golden object on their head. They then turn their head, facing forward, and move their mouth. Their right hand moves on their hip.

[11-18] Finally, the person in the purple top raises their head and arms as a golden armor falls from above and encases their body. The scene switches to a close-up of the person in the purple top. They close their eyes, put their hands on their hips, and smile happily. The camera zooms out, and a skeleton wearing a red scarf appears on the left. The Creeper is sitting to the upper left of the skeleton. The skeleton in the red scarf picks up a bow and arrow with both hands and aims at the person in the purple top. An arrow shoots towards the person in the purple top, who raises their right hand to block their face. The scene switches to a close-up of the person in the purple top's face as an arrow hits their right hand. They widen their eyes, their mouth corners turn downwards, and they look forward. The scene changes to the skeleton wearing a red scarf running from right to left. Then, the person in the purple top enters from the right. They open their mouth wide to reveal sharp teeth, and the whole scene turns red.
